description: The Samastipur RTO (BR-33) is the primary motor vehicle regulatory authority for the Samastipur district in Bihar, operating under the Darbhanga administrative division. It facilitates essential services such as vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of the Motor Vehicles Act across the district's vast subdivisions. The office plays a critical role in managing transport infrastructure for this major agricultural and railway hub in North Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Collectoriate Building, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar
